name: Mage's Notebook
description: A notebook full of complicated-looking equations and spell incantations, for those with the talent to cast them (that's not you, just to be clear).

name: Killing Note
description: A black, leather-bound ordinary notebook that says "Killing Note" on the front cover. Inside of the cover, it says "The human whose name is written in this note shall die." Well, that's a bit ominous, isn't it? There are no names written in the notebook.
